metadata.title: Minio Integration
metadata.description: Integration spec for Minio object storage (setup, usage, agent tasks)

overview: Minio is used as the S3-compatible object storage backend for all user files (text, images, video, audio, documents, code, etc.).
usage: Buckets per user or data type
Store raw files, retrieve for processing and download
Integrate with AI/ML pipelines and UI
agent_tasks: Write Minio upload/download utility (Python: minio-py or boto3)
Implement file storage and retrieval endpoints
Write tests for all file types
